en: Otto H. Königsberger (13 October 1908 – 3 January 1999) was a German architect who worked mainly in urban development planning in Africa, Asia and Latin America, with the United Nations.[1][2][3]
or: ଓଟୋ କୋନିଙ୍ଗ୍ସବର୍ଗର (୧୨ ଅକ୍ଟୋବର ୧୯୦୮ – ୩ ଜାନୁଆରୀ ୧୯୯୯) ଜଣେ ଜର୍ମାନ ସ୍ଥପତି ଥିଲେ । ସେ ଆଫ୍ରିକା, ଏସିଆ ଓ ଲାଟିନ ଆମେରିକା ଓ ମିଳିତ ଜାତିସଂଘରେ ସହରାଞ୍ଚଳ ବିକାଶ ଯୋଜନାରେ କାମ କରିଥିଲେ ।[1][2][3]

en: Otto H. Königsberger (13 October 1908 – 3 January 1999) was a German architect who worked mainly in urban development planning in Africa, Asia and Latin America, with the United Nations.[1][2][3]
